comments: DO NOT TAKE HIM. Literally the worst prof. I ever had. Does NOT give extra credit. NO grading criteria. Basically you have no idea what your grade is until the end of the semester. Don\'t ask him for help because he doesn\'t even know. You will regret taking this class.

comments: Wells is a really friendly professor. I just hated his class. Lectures are extremely unorganized and he talks really, really fast. His classes consist of him reading off a PowerPoint, or showing 5 TED talks in one day. The class itself is easy but exams are based solely off the textbook. He\'s a really easy grader though.

comments: Take this class You won\'t regret it!! It\'s hard to fail this class. Mr. Wells makes the class fun and the speeches are super easy. 5-7 min each and two debate shows that are available at the campus theatre are required with a take home exam of 10 things you learned in class. Trust me, those who dropped early missed out!! I walked away with an \'A .

He gives small lectures and presentation along with video. He is a great person and overall a fun, hilarious teacher that I have ever met. Please take this class
